评论详情: I have worn dockers classic fit men's pants to the office on a daily basis for over 20 years, and the latest purchase December 2024 was a huge disappointment. Thinner cheaper material, pockets not as deep, no key slot in the pocket, and an overall cheap feel compared to the other dockers I wear regularly. Good job Levis/Dockers management, screw your customer and destroy your future business for pennies a pair.  A dissatisfied verified no longer loyal customer.

类型: Special Size: StandardSize: 33W x 30LColor: Dark Pebble
评论详情: I absolutely love these pants. I have 3 pairs at this point. They are super comfortable and very soft for pants.  They do have a looser fit than most pants, which is personally why I like them so much. I'm 5'9" 165lb, ordered in 33" inseam. I guess I have a larger hip/thigh area because I cannot wear normal pants as they are so tight in the crotch. These are so perfect for me, and provide all day comfort in and out the office. I had 3 pairs previously and noticed that there was some slight shrinkage, weirdly in the inseam. So this time I'm going to be extra careful and only use the recommended washing settings (shoulda done that anyways).  I highly recommend these.

评论详情: Men over 45 know that casual or business wear now seems to be a clown show. Finding trousers etc which are calm and routine - and what we've used (mostly)  for bringing dignity to the wearer is hard to find now - the truly fine items are very pricey. Dockers has lots to choose from and they reach for stubborn men who moved past Lady Gaga. We will do ourselves fine with this outfit and line. We may get mocked as "preppies" or "old goats" - but we'll shrug that off and feel what was good before is still nifty right now.
